sum get token metadata
desc 5 credits per api call
get metadata of nfts erc721 and erc1155 or multitokens erc1155 only by ids for a given token address our api lets you search for all tokens on

celo  celo / celotestnet
ethereum  ethereum / ethereumsepolia
bnb binance smart chain  bsc / bsctestnet
polygon  polygon / polygonmumbai

to get started

provide a chain name token address and commaseparated list of ids our api will return relevant metadata about each specified token including its name description image and more
aside from the metadata information the response also contains token types and metadata url minted in each token
